overview: Horny maintenance men David Ashfield and Michael Charles trade blowjobs in an underground tunnel. Scott Taylor and Ivan use vacuum pumps to further enlarge their already huge meat before engaging in side-by-side self-sucking. Ryder Hanson and Latin hunk Melchoir play docking games in a doctor's office. Window washers Derrick Stanton and Tony Kennedy get it on high above Hollywood Boulevard.
tagline: Where's the strangest place you ever had sex?
title: Strange Places… Strange Things!
